pullrequest.title: Fix for bullet crashing when mesh shape files cannot be found.

content.raw:
It could happen in physics.cc, but the test cases you've added to is a `TEST_F`, which only tests for ODE. It needs to be a `TEST_P` in order to test for each physics engine.

`test/integration/factory.cc` seems like a decent place for it. I think you could use the [SpawnTrimesh function](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/ebef2bfd603d4246b0a59b16f0c1374abe19490f/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ServerFixture.cc-1596).
content.html:
It could happen in physics.cc, but the test cases you've added to is a TEST_F, which only tests for ODE. It needs to be a TEST_P in order to test for each physics engine.

test/integration/factory.cc seems like a decent place for it. I think you could use the SpawnTrimesh function.
